function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poorly lit and uncomfortable spaces","Impact":"Decreased well-being and increased health risks","Mitigation":"Improve lighting, ventilation, and ergonomic design","Technologies":"Smart lighting, air purifiers, ergonomic furniture","People":"Residents, occupants","Owner":"Architects, designers, building owners"},{"Description":"Exterior-interior transition and disinfection areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enhance disinfection protocols, improve ventilation","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems, touchless fixtures","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Lack of organization in storage rooms and spaces","Impact":"Risk of poor hygiene and pest infestations","Mitigation":"Implement storage organization systems, regular cleaning routines","Technologies":"Storage solutions, pest control devices","People":"Residents, facility managers","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers"}]}
